ingredientsDesc:
MICROPLATE: wells coated with antihuman IgM monoclonal antibodies.
CONJUGATE: monoclonal antibodies labelled with peroxidase, in phosphate buffer with phenol 0.05% and Bronidox 0.02%.
POSITIVE CONTROL: Dilueted human serum in phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/l with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%.
CONTROL CUT OFF: Diluted human serum in phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/l with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%.
IgM NEGATIVE CONTROL: Diluted Human serum in phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/l with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%.
SUBSTRATE: Tetramethylbenzidine 0.26 mg/ml and hydrogen peroxide 0.01% stabilized in citrate buffer 0.05 mol/l.
DILUENT 50X: Protein solution concentrated 50 times with added phenol 0.05% and Bronidox 0.02%.
WASH BUFFER 10X: Phosphate buffered saline, concentrated 10 times; contains Brij 0.5%.
STOP SOLUTION: H2SO4 0.3mol/l.
ANTIGEN: Purified Measles virus in phosphate buffer.
applicantName: 美艾利爾健康股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大同區塔城街64號3樓
efficacy: 用於血清試驗中鑑定對血清中麻疹病毒的IgM抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3520 麻疹病毒血清試劑

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: VIA CRISTONI, 12, 40033 CASALECCHIO DI RENO, BOLOGNA (BO), ITALY
